Summary: A huge gray cigar shape object over Sobradinho, DF.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was having my breakfast. The kitchen of my house is in a hill, so I can see Brasilia City from above. The sky was clean without clouds. The sun was shinning. Suddenly a bright flash caught my attention. I looked outside and saw a huge, I mean, very huge, cigar shape object. It was gray, a polish gray, shinny. I could estimate the size because the TV tower that is 23 km distant from me and it has 35m high. The object, I calculate, had aprox. 30m long. It was hovering for 10 minutes until in a amazing speed shhot off to the sky! I know that at least 5 more people saw it because I could see those people looking to the sky.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Brasilia
There were no other sightings in Brasilia on or around May 22nd 2009
